attributes.action: "No deal" Brexit must be the default.
attributes.additional_details: We need clarity and faith in the democratic process.   The unelected House of Lords must not be allowed to work with Brussels or foreign investors to show horn us into a bad deal.    If it is certain that we will leave with no deal at all, ALL parties will work towards the most beneficial outcome for all.
attributes.background: Brexit is unconditional.   If no deal is achieved in the negotiations then we must leave on 29th March 2019 with no deal.
